meanings.definition: Smaller in size or dimensions than is usual or necessary.
meanings.sent1: The undersized puppy struggled to keep up with the larger dogs at the park.
meanings.sent2: The undersized backpack barely fit all of my school supplies.
meanings.sent3: The undersized umbrella was comically small, barely providing any shelter from the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her undersized car was like a toy compared to the massive trucks on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The undersized basketball hoop made it challenging for the kids to score points.

meanings.definition: Below the standard or required size.
meanings.sent1: The undersized shirt was too tight and uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent2: The undersized suitcase could not fit all of my clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The undersized cake looked adorable but left everyone wanting more.
meanings.sent4: Her undersized phone screen made it difficult to read messages clearly.
meanings.sent5: The undersized plant struggled to grow in the small pot.
